name: Squares Squared
description:
Solve challenging puzzles in Squares Squared! No puzzle stands a chance against the power of two.

Controls:

Archer (Green Square):

A/D: Move Left and Right

Mouse/Left Click: Aim and Fire

Jumper (Blue Square):

Left/Right: Move Left and Right

Spacebar: Jump

R - Restart Level

Q - Change music (Check out all the cool tracks!)

Tip: Only three projectiles can be on screen at a time. Use this to your advantage!

Music: Three Red Hearts by Abstraction

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Created for One Game a Month #13 Game Jam.
